bioconda.name: merlin
bioconda.summary: MERLIN uses sparse trees to represent gene flow in pedigrees and is a fast pedigree analysis package

biocontainers.name: merlin
biocontainers.summary: MERLIN uses sparse trees to represent gene flow in pedigrees and is a fast pedigree analysis package

biotools.summary: Can be used for parametric and non-parametric linkage analysis, regression-based linkage analysis or association analysis for quantitative traits, ibd and kinship estimation, haplotyping, error detection and simulation

bioschemas.name: Merlin
bioschemas.summary: Can be used for parametric and non-parametric linkage analysis, regression-based linkage analysis or association analysis for quantitative traits, ibd and kinship estimation, haplotyping, error detection and simulation

galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Can be used for parametric and non-parametric linkage analysis, regression-based linkage analysis or association analysis for quantitative traits, ibd and kinship estimation, haplotyping, error detection and simulation
